metadata.title: CVE-2024-29506 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Artifex Ghostscript before 10.03.0 has a stack-based buffer overflow in thepdfi_apply_filter() function via a long PDF filter name.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-29506` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ghostscript - 9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5.9
ghostscript-x - 9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5.9
libgs9 - 9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5.9
libgs9-common - 9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5.9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ghostscript package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5.9').
